text: Hong Kong competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. 25 competitors, 23 men and 2 women, took part in 27 events in 6 sports. ==Athletes== * Chan Fai Lui Cycling * Chan Lam Hams Cycling * Matthew Chan Wah Hei Fencing * Chow Tsun Man Shooting * Mark Anthony Crocker Swimming * Denis Cunningham Fencing * Reginald Dos Remedios Shooting * Hui Cheong Canoeing * Roger Kam Wai Leung Fencing * Kwan Honk Wai Canoeing * Lawrence Kwoh Swimming * Kwong Chi Yan Cycling * Solomon Lee Kui Nang Shooting * Raphaelynne Lee Swimming * Mak Chi Wai Canoeing * Mok Cheuk Wing Judo * Ng Hin Wan Canoeing * Ng Tsuen Man Canoeing * Ng Wing Biu Fencing * Camilo Pedro Shooting * Karen Robertson Swimming * Peter Rull Sr. (Estonia) Shooting * Tang Kam Man Cycling * Tso Hok Young Shooting * John Wai Canoeing ==Canoeing== ==Cycling== Four cyclists represented Hong Kong in 1976. ;Individual road race * Kwong Chi Yan -- did not finish (→ no ranking) * Chan Fai Lui -- did not finish (→ no ranking) * Tang Kam Man -- did not finish (→ no ranking) * Chan Lam Hams -- did not finish (→ no ranking) ;Team time trial * Chan Fai Lui * Chan Lam Hams * Kwong Chi Yan * Tang Kam Man ;1000m time trial * Chan Fai Lui -- 1:16.957 (→ 28th place) ;Individual pursuit * Tang Kam Man -- 24th place ==Fencing== Four fencers, all men, represented Hong Kong in 1976. ;Men's foil * Ng Wing Biu * Kam Wai Leung * Chan Matthew ;Men's team foil * Chan Matthew, Denis Cunningham, Kam Wai Leung, Ng Wing Biu ;Men's épée * Kam Wai Leung * Denis Cunningham * Chan Matthew ;Men's team épée * Chan Matthew, Denis Cunningham, Kam Wai Leung, Ng Wing Biu ;Men's sabre * Kam Wai Leung ==Judo== ==Shooting== ==Swimming== ==References== ==External links== *Hong Kong Category:Nations at the 1976 Summer Olympics 1976 Summer Olympics Category:1976 in Hong Kong sport
title: Hong Kong at the 1976 Summer Olympics
